name: Agro Island
description:
Groups of three or more players take-on the roll of an Indonesian smallholder farmer, palm oil company, or conservationist. Working to maximize profits or minimize greenhouse gas emissions, they must make deals to move forward.

Produced to accompany the Michigan Sustainability Case "The Cost of Sustainable Palm Oil: Should an Indonesian smallholder farmer get RSPO Certified?." 

Find more open-access multimedia case studies, or create your own, at learngala.com.
